text: Axion is a genus of lady beetles in the family Coccinellidae. There are at least two described species in Axion. ==Species== * Axion plagiatum (Olivier, 1808) * Axion tripustulatum (De Geer, 1775) (three-spotted lady beetle) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Coccinellidae Category:Coccinellidae genera
title: Axion (genus)
